trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for controls that allow multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia klasę abstrakcyjną dla formantów, które zezwala na zaznaczanie wielu elementów.

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the MultiSelector class, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` to allow multi-selection in your control.
trans-unit.target: Gdy klasa wyprowadzona z klasy MultiSelector, ustaw <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>właściwości `true` umożliwia wielokrotnego wyboru formantu.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>jest to klasa abstrakcyjna i nie można utworzyć wystąpienia bezpośrednio.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>

trans-unit.source: Starts a new selection transaction.
trans-unit.target: Uruchamia nową transakcję zaznaczenia.

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdateSelectedItems method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ustawia metodę BeginUpdateSelectedItems <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>do `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>Zestawy metody <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>do `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>jest <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> gdy ta metoda jest wywoływana.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość wskazującą, czy wielokrotność elementy w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> można wybrać w czasie.

trans-unit.source: Set the CanSelectMultipleItems property to `true` in a derived class to allow multi-selection for that class.
trans-unit.target: Ustaw dla właściwości właściwość CanSelectMultipleItems `true` w klasie pochodnej, aby umożliwić wielokrotnego wyboru dla tej klasy.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli wiele elementów w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> może być wybrana w czasie; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Commits the selected items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Zatwierdza wybrane elementy do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false` and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda ustawia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>do `false` i aktualizuje <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>kolekcji.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>Zestawy metody <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>do `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>jest <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> gdy ta metoda jest wywoływana.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> wykonuje obecnie aktualizacji zbiorczej <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>kolekcji.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>Metody ustawia IsUpdatingSelectedItems `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>Metody ustawia IsUpdatingSelectedItems `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> wykonuje obecnie aktualizacji zbiorczej <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>kolekcji; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Wybiera wszystkie elementy w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć tylko wtedy, gdy metoda <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>jest `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera elementy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> , które są wybrane.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `false`, you cannot add more than one item to the SelectedItems collection.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>jest `false`, nie można dodać więcej niż jeden element do kolekcji SelectedItems.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to do so will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: Próbuje zrobić spowoduje, że wystąpił wyjątek.

trans-unit.source: The items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Elementy w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> , które są wybrane.

trans-unit.source: Unselects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa wszystkie elementy w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method regardless of whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć tej metody, niezależnie od tego, czy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>jest `true` lub `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>
